import numpy as np

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

from scipy.stats import skew

x = np.linspace( -5, 5, 10000 )
y_sqr_exp = 1./(np.sqrt(2.*np.pi)) * np.exp( -.5*(x)**2  ) 

print("y_sqr_exp skewness",skew(y_sqr_exp) )
